DOC.brief_title: A Study People With High Cholesterol
DOC.criteria: Men woman 18 80 year age People abnormal cholesterol level People diabetes People whose blood pressure > 160/95 mm Hg , blood pressure medicine People frequent chest pain unstable angina , heart attack heart procedure include stent placement , within past 3 month
